projects.title: Magic the Gathering Deck Builder
projects.description: A web application that allows users to build and share their own Magic the Gathering decks. Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Used Car Dealership Web Application
projects.description: A modern, full-stack car dealership management system built with React, Express, TypeScript, and SQLite. Features vehicle listings with advanced filtering, customer testimonials, staff directory, finance applications, and contact management with a responsive UI.

projects.title: Terminal-Style UI Showcase
projects.description: A comprehensive collection of terminal-inspired UI components built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a dark, monospace aesthetic inspired by Unit 410, including navigation components, expandable sections, hex displays, terminal modals, form components, data tables, and interactive elements with a distinctive command-line interface design.

projects.title: GitHub Summary
projects.description: A GitHub reporting script that retrieves and summarizes all commits and pull requests made within a given week or custom date range. Provides comprehensive activity reports for GitHub repositories, enabling easy tracking and analysis of development activity over time.

projects.title: Playing Card Deck Storage System
projects.description: A comprehensive desktop application built with Python, Tkinter, and SQLAlchemy for managing card collections. Features series management, inventory and wishlist tracking with detailed item properties (signature, gilded, sealed status), filtering and sorting capabilities, image preview support, and a modern tabbed interface. Includes executable build support for easy distribution.

projects.title: Charlie Code Reviewer
projects.description: An automated code review service that integrates with GitHub webhooks to provide AI-powered code reviews on pull requests. Built with TypeScript, Express.js, and Ollama. Features AI-powered code analysis using Ollama (qwen2.5-coder:7b), static code analysis with ESLint and Flake8, GitHub App authentication, automated PR comments, and Smee integration for local development. Provides intelligent, automated code feedback directly on pull requests.

projects.title: DodoBot Official
projects.description: A feature-rich Discord music bot built with Python, Discord.py, Spotify API, and Pytube. Enables music playback from YouTube and Spotify, voice channel integration, playlist management with queue, shuffle, skip, and pause controls. Includes voice command support for hands-free operation and supports both text and voice-based interactions.

projects.title: PDFtoMD
projects.description: A document conversion tool that converts PDF documents to Markdown format. Enables easy transformation of PDF content into Markdown, making documents more accessible, editable, and version-controllable. Useful for documentation workflows and content migration.

projects.title: A11yChrome
projects.description: A Chrome extension that automatically enhances webpage accessibility by injecting missing ARIA attributes into HTML elements and improving semantic structure. Built with TypeScript, Webpack, and Tailwind CSS. Features automatic ARIA attribute injection, semantic HTML detection, interactive element analysis, real-time accessibility suggestions, color customization with hue rotation and contrast adjustment for color-blind users, and auto-transform mode for automatic accessibility fixes.

projects.title: Peace Through Food - Recipe Website
projects.description: A modern, beautiful recipe website built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS that promotes the concept of 'Peace through food' - sharing food brings calm to conflict. Features a homepage with video background, advanced recipe browser with category and meat type filtering, search functionality, interactive recipe carousel with detailed views, recipe modal with full ingredients and instructions, multiple pages (About, Contact, Pricing, Recipes), email subscription component, and a fully responsive design with smooth animations and transitions.
